name: LARMS: Enabling LLMs to Provide Remedy for Mental Status
description: A novel mental health companion utilizing large language models, evaluated using BLEU and CIDEr metrics.

name: Enhanced Sparse Attention
description: A project focusing on enhanced sparse attention mechanisms for improving computational efficiency and accuracy in various tasks.

name: YoloChat
description: An AI-powered chatbot built using the YOLO object detection model for context-aware conversations.

name: Demoire.dat
description: A solution to reduce moiré patterns in images, leveraging advanced image processing and deep learning techniques.

name: MinBPE.rs
description: A minimal byte-pair encoding implementation in Rust designed for speed and simplicity.
